source:
#Create DataFrame for the dboorder LMS Table
dboorder = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorageprod.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboorder.parquet', format='parquet')
dboorder.createOrReplaceTempView("dboorder")

#Create DataFrame for the dbocustomer LMS Table
dbocustomer = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorageprod.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbocustomer.parquet', format='parquet')
dbocustomer.createOrReplaceTempView("dbocustomer")

#Create DataFrame for the dbousers LMS Table
dbousers = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorageprod.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbousers.parquet', format='parquet')
dbousers.createOrReplaceTempView("dbousers")

#Create DataFrame for the sstparcelbyorder LMS Table
sstparcelbyorder = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorageprod.dfs.core.windows.net/Semi Structured Data/OPS/sstparcelbyorder.parquet', format='parquet')
sstparcelbyorder.createOrReplaceTempView("sstparcelbyorder")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
sstorder 
AS
SELECT 
     O.id as lms_order_id
    ,O.idold as lms_order_idold
    ,O.corderno as lms_order_corderno
    ,O.custref as lms_order_custref
    ,O.waybillid as lms_order_waybillid
    ,O.pickupcustid as lms_order_pickupcustid
    ,O.delivercustid as lms_order_delivercustid
    ,O.billcustid as lms_order_billcustid
    ,O.ovalue as lms_order_ovalue
    ,O.hodate as lms_order_hodate
    ,O.cservice as lms_order_cservice
    ,O.courierid as lms_order_courierid
    ,O.custservice as lms_order_custservice
    ,O.userid as lms_order_userid
    ,O.pcode as lms_order_pcode
    ,O.appointment as lms_order_appointment
    ,O.deliverby as lms_order_deliverby
    ,O.dconfirmed as lms_order_dconfirmed
    ,O.dcomment as lms_order_dcomment
    ,O.drefno as lms_order_drefno
    ,O.duserid as lms_order_duserid
    ,O.nopods as lms_order_nopods
    ,O.duedate as lms_order_duedate
    ,O.batchno as lms_order_batchno
    ,O.units as lms_order_units
    ,O.airfreightflag as lms_order_airfreightflag
    ,O.custref3 as lms_order_custref3
    ,O.specdel as lms_order_specdel
    ,O.flunits as lms_order_flunits
    ,O.flkgs as lms_order_flkgs
    ,O.inservice as lms_order_inservice
    ,O.custdocs as lms_order_custdocs
    ,O.scanned as lms_order_scanned
    ,O.scanimagename1 as lms_order_scanimagename1
    ,O.scanimagename as lms_order_scanimagename
    ,O.changereasonid as lms_order_changereasonid
    ,O.bill_servicetype as lms_order_bill_servicetype
    ,O.bill_vehicletype as lms_order_bill_vehicletype
    ,O.quote as lms_order_quote
    ,O.consignlabel as lms_order_consignlabel
    ,O.custref2 as lms_order_custref2
    ,O.callprogid as lms_order_callprogid
    ,O.callprogupddate as lms_order_callprogupddate
    ,O.submitedi as lms_order_submitedi
    ,O.lastupdate as lms_order_lastupdate
    ,O.quoteflag as lms_order_quoteflag
    ,O.bill_minrate as lms_order_bill_minrate
    ,O.bill_addrate as lms_order_bill_addrate
    ,O.bill_minkg as lms_order_bill_minkg
    ,O.notes as lms_order_notes
    ,O.quoteweight as lms_order_quoteweight
    ,O.orderconsolidationid as lms_order_orderconsolidationid
    ,O.quotefuellevy as lms_order_quotefuellevy
    ,O.quoteothersurcharges as lms_order_quoteothersurcharges
    ,O.quotedocfees as lms_order_quotedocfees
    ,BC.id as lms_bcustomer_id
    ,BC.name as lms_bcustomer_name
    ,PC.id as lms_pcustomer_id
    ,PC.name as lms_pcustomer_name
    ,DC.id as lms_dcustomer_id
    ,DC.name as lms_dcustomer_name
    ,U.id as lms_users_id
    ,U.fullname as lms_users_fullname
    ,U.site as lms_users_site
    ,lms_parcelbyorder_orderid as lms_parcelbyorder_orderid
    ,lms_parcelbyorder_aggweight as lms_parcelbyorder_aggweight
    ,lms_parcelbyorder_aggchargeweight as lms_parcelbyorder_aggchargeweight
    ,lms_parcelbyorder_aggvolweight as lms_parcelbyorder_aggvolweight
    ,lms_parcelbyorder_aggvolumiserweight as lms_parcelbyorder_aggvolumiserweight
    ,lms_parcelbyorder_noparcels as lms_parcelbyorder_noparcels
FROM dboorder O
LEFT JOIN dbocustomer BC ON BC.id = O.billcustid
LEFT JOIN dbocustomer PC ON PC.id = O.pickupcustid
LEFT JOIN dbocustomer DC ON DC.id = O.delivercustid
LEFT JOIN dbousers U ON U.id = O.userid
LEFT JOIN sstparcelbyorder PBO ON PBO.lms_parcelbyorder_orderid  = O.id
